verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w vision|strong="H2384"\w*. What aileth thee \w now|strong="H0645"\w*, that thou art wholly gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w housetops|strong="H1406"\w*?

Thou that art \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w stirs|strong="H8663"\w*, a \w tumultuous|strong="H1993"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, a \w joyous|strong="H5947"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*: thy \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \add men are\add* not \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, nor \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

All thy \w rulers|strong="H7101"\w* are \w fled|strong="H5074"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, they are \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* by the \w archers|strong="H7198"\w*: all that are \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in thee are \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \add which\add* have \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*.\f + \fr 22.3 \ft by…: Heb. of the bow\f*

Therefore \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, Look \w away|strong="H8159"\w* from me; I will \w weep|strong="H1065"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H4843"\w*, \w labour|strong="H0213"\w* not to \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* me, because of the \w spoiling|strong="H7701"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 22.4 \ft weep…: Heb. be bitter in weeping\f*

For \add it is\add* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H4103"\w*, and of treading \w down|strong="H4001"\w*, and of \w perplexity|strong="H3998"\w* by the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w vision|strong="H2384"\w*, \w breaking|strong="H6979"\w* down the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w*, and of \w crying|strong="H7771"\w* to the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

And \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w quiver|strong="H0827"\w* with \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \add and\add* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w* \w uncovered|strong="H6168"\w* the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.\f + \fr 22.6 \ft uncovered: Heb. made naked\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* thy \w choicest|strong="H4005"\w* \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and the \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* shall \w set|strong="H7896"\w* themselves in \w array|strong="H7896"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.\f + \fr 22.7 \ft thy…: Heb. the choice of thy valleys\f*\f + \fr 22.7 \ft at: or, toward\f*

¶ And he \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* the \w covering|strong="H4539"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and thou didst \w look|strong="H5027"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to the \w armour|strong="H5402"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

Ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* also the \w breaches|strong="H1233"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, that they are \w many|strong="H7231"\w*: and ye gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w lower|strong="H8481"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*.

And ye have \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* have ye broken \w down|strong="H5422"\w* to \w fortify|strong="H1219"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

Ye \w made|strong="H6213"\w* also a \w ditch|strong="H4724"\w* between the two \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* for the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w old|strong="H3465"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*: but ye have not \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* unto the \w maker|strong="H6213"\w* thereof, neither had \w respect|strong="H7200"\w* unto him that \w fashioned|strong="H3335"\w* it long \w ago|strong="H7350"\w*.

And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* did the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* to \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, and to \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w*, and to \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w*, and to \w girding|strong="H2296"\w* with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*:

And behold \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, \w slaying|strong="H2026"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w killing|strong="H7819"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: let us \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*; for to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* we shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And it was \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* in mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* by the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, Surely this \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* shall not be \w purged|strong="H3722"\w* from you till ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w get|strong="H0935"\w* thee unto this \w treasurer|strong="H5532"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w*, which \add is\add* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add and say\add*,

What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here, that thou hast hewed thee \w out|strong="H2672"\w* a \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \add as\add* he that heweth him \w out|strong="H2672"\w* a \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, \add and\add* that \w graveth|strong="H2710"\w* an \w habitation|strong="H4908"\w* for himself in a \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*?\f + \fr 22.16 \ft as…: or, O he\f*

Behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will carry thee \w away|strong="H2904"\w* with a \w mighty|strong="H1397"\w* \w captivity|strong="H2925"\w*, and will \w surely|strong="H5844"\w* \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* thee.\f + \fr 22.17 \ft will carry…: or, who covered thee with an excellent covering, and clothed thee gorgeously, (next verse) shall surely, etc\f*\f + \fr 22.17 \ft a mighty…: Heb. the captivity of a man\f*

He will \w surely|strong="H6801"\w* violently \w turn|strong="H6801"\w* and \w toss|strong="H6802"\w* thee \add like\add* a \w ball|strong="H1754"\w* into a \w large|strong="H7342"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: there shalt thou \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and there the \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* of thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* of thy \w lord’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 22.18 \ft large: Heb. large of spaces\f*
And I will \w drive|strong="H1920"\w* thee from thy \w station|strong="H4673"\w*, and from thy \w state|strong="H4612"\w* shall he pull thee \w down|strong="H2040"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*:

And I will \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* him with thy \w robe|strong="H3801"\w*, and \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* him with thy \w girdle|strong="H0073"\w*, and I will \w commit|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w government|strong="H4475"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and he shall be a \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And the \w key|strong="H4668"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* will I \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* upon his \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*; so he shall \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, and none shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*; and he shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*, and none shall \w open|strong="H6605"\w*.

And I will \w fasten|strong="H8628"\w* him \add as\add* a \w nail|strong="H3489"\w* in a \w sure|strong="H0539"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; and he shall be for a \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* to his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And they shall \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* upon him all the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w offspring|strong="H6631"\w* and the \w issue|strong="H6849"\w*, all \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w small|strong="H6996"\w* quantity, from the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w cups|strong="H0101"\w*, even to all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w flagons|strong="H5035"\w*.\f + \fr 22.24 \ft vessels of flagons: or, instruments of viols\f*

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, shall the \w nail|strong="H3489"\w* that is \w fastened|strong="H8628"\w* in the \w sure|strong="H0539"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* be \w removed|strong="H4185"\w*, and be cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*; and the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* that \add was\add* upon it shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.
